mapper.insert: INSERT INTO temp_users (user_id) SELECT u4.user_id FROM userlogins4.users u4, userlogins3.users u3 WHERE u4.is_guest = 1 AND u4.user_id = u3.user_id AND u3.is_guest = 0
INSERT INTO temp_users (user_id) SELECT u3.user_id FROM userlogins4.users u4, userlogins3.users u3 WHERE u3.is_guest = 1 AND u4.user_id = u3.user_id AND u4.is_guest = 0
INSERT INTO temp_users (user_id) SELECT user_id FROM userlogins3_archive.users WHERE is_guest = 1 AND user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM userlogins3_archive.steps)
INSERT INTO temp_users (user_id) SELECT user_id FROM userlogins3_archive_south.users WHERE is_guest = 1 AND user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM userlogins3_archive_south.steps)
INSERT INTO temp_users (user_id) SELECT user_id FROM userlogins3.users WHERE is_guest = 1 AND register_time <= #{cutoffDate} AND user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM userlogins3.steps)
INSERT INTO temp_users (user_id) SELECT user_id FROM userlogins4.users WHERE is_guest = 1 AND register_time <= #{cutoffDate} AND user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM userlogins4.steps)
